title: Count Catula
description: Cait and the gang set out to find a killer when novelist Amanda Lowman is found dead just an hour after speaking to the Mystery Lovers Book Club about her true crime novel, The Vampire Murders. As Cait delves into Amanda's death, she finds a spider web of lies and half truths that could very well be tied to a series of murders that took place fifteen years prior. The deeper Cait digs the more tangled the web and the closer she comes to being the vampire killer's next victim.
author: Kathi Daley
